name: Hide MAL Scores and other things (UPDATED)
description: Updated version of "Hide MAL Scores and other things". I've fixed all the broken stuff and added some more stuff. So this should be all you need to remove all the annoying stuff (e.g. score, ranking, reviews). But what if (you) want some of that crap (e.g. want reviews)?? It's all commented, so you just delete the section you don't want. It's all super easy.
